availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Thompson (Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer)

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Dunn Thompson in Bullitt County, Kentucky, on September 10, 1838. Father of Emily E. Thompson, John V. Thompson, Mary E. Thompson, Ruth F. Thompson, Tarleson D. Thompson. Attorney and farmer in Bullitt County in 1860. Employed John V. Thompson as a farm laborer in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District 1, p. 690.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bullitt County Marriages, Film #000482690, p. 77.
Find A Grave, "William R. Thompson (1810-1894)," Memorial #50845630, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50845630 (accessed May 29, 2017).
